Directions: In a slow cooker, combine the first seven ingredients and mix well. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or until thickened and heated through, stirring occasionally. Garnish with cheese if desired.
Ingredients: 1/2 pound ground beef, cooked and drained
1/2 pound bulk pork sausage, cooked and drained
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed tomato soup, undiluted
